alert.note: Alert for McClain; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 28 at 6:03PM CDT until July 28 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Oklahoma, including the following counties, Cleveland, McClain and Oklahoma. * WHEN...Until 915 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 603 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Oklahoma City, northern Norman, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, Newcastle, Choctaw, Harrah, Spencer, Jones, Nicoma Park, Valley Brook, Tinker Air Force Base, Stanley Draper Lake, Stella, northern Lake Thunderbird, Newalla, Forest Park, Smith Village and The Capitol. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
